titulo: Chat gemini as an excellent programming tool
contenido: Gemini is an excellent support tool to refresh and remember, it additionally gives you code suggestions, I can write code, generate documentation, debug and even generate code from certain instructions, learn to program.

titulo: The important thing about documenting Code
contenido: It is a fundamental part of software development. Writing good documentation can have many benefits, such as: Makes code easier to understand, Improve collaboration, Reduce maintenance time, Increase code quality, Facilitates code reuse.

titulo: It is very important many times to write down and practice what you have learned.
contenido: We must sometimes take free time to practice functions or frameworks learned, since this will help us reinforce and better understand what we have learned.
